page.title: 16Chilton Community College.
page.content: The Cozy Club is held for mentally handicapped people who are less fortunate then we are and a special bus fetches handicapped elderly people to their own club. There are two youth clubs. One for the younger children and one for the older ones. Other clubs for children include the art class and the jazz band. When school is not on the school dining hall becomes a coffee bar which also sells hot dogs. The Community College also organises trips for both children and adults and also charity appeals as well as arranging matches and fixtures with other community associations or recreation centres. I am nearly always down at the Comm unity College. It has changed my life.
